TopicTitle: Camera angle request: Bring locked camera back.

Articles.Content:
Locked camera:

was best at KSP 1 to do docking.

It aligned to control point 

When aligned, vessel control was easier to eyeball.

I figured out chase cam is replacing locked camera now, i think that will do.

Chase cam doesn't replace locked cam currently, as it resets view wrong angles.

Edited December 31, 2023 by Jeq
Recent info.
For me the Chase camera seems to reset to be above the vessel (orthogonal to direction of thrust) any time I do any thrust.  I used it a lot in KSP1, but in 2 it's pretty useless.
